name: Seller Order Processing
headline: The day-to-day interface the marketplace seller has to use for processing and delivering the client orders
overview: This interface allows the marketplace seller to generate invoices and AWBs for the client orders to be delivered
features: Integrates your VTEX store with your external invoicing platform, such as SmartBill
Integrates your VTEX store with your courier platform, such as Innoship, Cargus, FAN Courier etc.
additionalInformation: This app requires valid accounts in the external invoicing and courier platforms
